AlphaRacks – Reseller, Master Reseller, & Linux OpenVZ VPS from $6/year – Los Angeles, CA

alpharacks, alpharacks.com, cpanel, ddos, los angeles, openvz, reseller, VPS April 16, 2017 @ 12:00 am, by Ishaq

Julian from AlphaRacks sent in an offer to celebrate Easter, with plans based in Los Angeles. They have been featured before and provide various services including Web Hosting, OpenVZ & KVM VPS, Windows VPS, and Dedicated Servers.

Services are provisioned on hostnodes featuring Dual Intel Xeon 5620 / 5639, 128GB RAM, 4 x 2TB HDD configured in hardware RAID10 with CacheVault. They are connected by 2 x 1Gbps uplinks.

All services include cPanel (Shared/Reseller) and SolusVM (VPS) as the control panel, 1 IPv4 and 20 IPv6, full root access, instant setup, and best effort DDoS mitigation by QuadraNet Vest.

Free Bonus: Open a ticket and request to have your bandwidth DOUBLED.

They offer PayPal, Credit Cards (via 2Checkout), and Bitcoin as payment methods. As always, please ensure you read their Terms of Service.

Offers:

Reseller Plans

What’s the difference? Reseller hosting accounts allow you to create shared hosting accounts only, while master resellers take it a step further, and allow you to create shared and reseller hosting accounts. For more information please see here.

All reseller accounts include access to AlphaRacks’ exclusive “Reseller Resources” portal, which includes all the tools you need to kick start your new hosting business (unlimited SSL certificates, free domain reseller, legal documents, pre-made website templates, knowledgebase articles to provide to your customers, and more).
